Cytovale

Putting the squeeze on cells...
unmasking biophysical markers

Morphological
Markers
Molecular
Markers

Office+Lab Hybrid

Based in San Francisco, Cytovale HQ is a bespoke work space fitted out to be the physical equivalent of our technology+biology hybrid company. As a team of 15, working in a collaborative space allows to move quickly and solve the big problems.

Cytovale develops biomarkers based on the mechanical properties of individual cells or mechanomics. It uses microfluidics to route and physically probe individual cells.

Primary Product

Early
Sepsis
Detection

We are enrolling a multi-hundred patient clinical study in support of our flagship product in early sepsis detection in the emergency department, which has the potential to satisfy a $1B+ diagnostic market and significantly reduce morbidity and mortality within the hospital, and we are demonstrating our platform’s potential in several additional applications.

Read the Research
The Cytovale System

Technology

Three decades of work in labs spanning the globe tell us that the biomechanical properties cells are intimately linked with cell state. Until deformability cytometry, most techniques could only measure tens of cells per hour.

Featured Publication

Quantitative Diagnosis of Malignant Pleural Effusions By Single-Cell Mechanophenotyping

Biophysical characteristics of cells are attractive as potential diagnostic markers for cancer. Transformation of cell state or phenotype and the accompanying epigenetic, nuclear, and cytoplasmic modifications lead to measureable changes in cellular...
